name: Statistical Consultation, Communication, and Collaboration
description: Through case studies and collaboration with researchers in other disciplines, students develop skills in the collaborative practice of Statistics. Focus is on pragmatic solutions to practical issues including study design, dealing with common complications in data analysis, and ethical practice, with particular emphasis on written communication.
prerequisites: STA303H1, STA304H1/STA305H1, STA355H1 (Permission of instructor. Priority is given to students completing all requirements of the Applied Statistics specialist program.)
